effect.name: Get Color Mask
effect.description:
Keep Color. Keeps the selected color but replaces all other colors with the specified new color.
Last Updated: 2020-07-27 01:07
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Replace others
parameter.description: Enabling this will hide the black and white versions of the colors

parameter.name: Replacement color
parameter.description: The new color for all other pixels.
